name: Exploding Chickens (CupOfIdeas)
description:
This game was made in 9h for Triple Trijam.

CONTROLS

Select your chicken and move it with mouse. You can either click or hold.

Click R to restart current level any time. Click P to restart whole game.

Quick devlog here:

Part1 

First 2 hours:

I managed to make some sprites as well as the movement for the chickens.

In the last hour I did 2 first levels for the game to make it playable.

Part 2

In this part i think I did the most of work, I managed to do pretty much all the levels, and make the game overall playable. I also did the restart option as well as the reset, so the player could restart the game entirely.

Here is the concept for making chickens explode with blood. I didn't stick to it because I didn't really liked how this effect turned out.

Part 3

In this part I mostly focused on fixing bugs and making sound effects. Sadly I forgot to make any music so the game is quiet. I think if I'll ever update it, music will be the first thing i'll add.

END

The game is finished! It took around 8-9 hours and overall it was pretty fun expirience! Waiting for TripleTrijam #2 <3
